welcome_message_body: Welcome to Issy-les-Moulineaux! This charming city is known for its picturesque streets, beautiful parks, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Issy-les-Moulineaux has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines for both international and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds and unlimited access.
